sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.GetOutputFieldTypes</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Implements extension point global.MLCapabilityDefinitionExtPt</description>
        <name>GetOutputFieldTypes</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var GetOutputFieldTypes = Class.create();
GetOutputFieldTypes.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	process:function(tableName,capability){
		var result = [];
		try{
			var epoints = new global.GlideScriptedExtensionPoint();
			var eps = epoints.getExtensions("mlOutputFieldTypeExtPt");
			if (eps.length > 0){
				var point = eps[0];
				result = point.getMLOutputFieldChoices(tableName,capability);
			} 
		} catch(ex) {
			gs.error("Error running extension points!");
		}
		return result;
	},
    type: 'GetOutputFieldTypes'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-08-20 00:06:23</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>871c517a53133300d1dcddeeff7b1259</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>GetOutputFieldTypes</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Predictive Intelligence" source="com.glide.platform_ml">fccdbc4b6d2220100acb70b3534330f2</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_871c517a53133300d1dcddeeff7b1259</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-02-12 06:36:33</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>543</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
